imdb.title: Kidô Senkan Nadesico
imdb.plot: Some unknown presence is attacking Earth with dangerous robots and the only thing that can save the day is the crew of the Nadesico: a powerful spaceship.

episodes.title: Midori no chikyû wa makasetoke
episodes.plot: Uneasy about the idea of a powerful battleship being in the hands of civilians, the United Earth military sends Admiral Misumaru's fleet to take control of the Nadesico.

episodes.title: Hayasugiru 'Sayonara'!
episodes.plot: The Nadesico heads to Mars, but in order to get there, it has to pass through the Earth's various lines of defense, including the Big Barrier. Can the Nadesico convince the United Earth forces to take down the barrier, or will they force their way through?

episodes.title: Mizuiro uchû ni 'Tokimeki'
episodes.plot: The Nadesico heads out to the Satsuki Midori space colony to pick up some new zero-G Aestivalis frames and pilots.

episodes.title: Ruri chan 'Kôkai nisshi'
episodes.plot: On the long and boring trip to Mars, Prospector insists that Yurika take the time to perform funerals for all those who have been killed. The never-ending task leaves her no time to see Akito or to resolve her feelings towards him.

episodes.title: 'Unmei no sentaku' mitaina
episodes.plot: The Nadesico finally arrives at Mars only to have to fend off an enemy attack. Several members of the crew, including Akito, head out to explore the ruins.

episodes.title: Atsume no 'Tsumetai hôteishiki'
episodes.plot: The Nadesico successfully returns to Earth only to find themselves right in the middle of a major battle. Meanwhile, on the battlefield, Akito's paralyzing fear has returned, making him a vulnerable target for the Jovians.

episodes.title: Kiseki no sakusen 'Kisu ka?'
episodes.plot: Admiral Munetake sends the Nadesico to rescue a goodwill ambassador stranded on an inhospitable island. Meanwhile, Megumi decides to use her free time to get closer to Akito in a virtual-reality simulation. But will Akito's childhood memories of Yurika distract him enough to spoil all of Megumi's efforts?

episodes.title: Ki ga tsukeba 'Oyakusoku'
episodes.plot: The Nadesico finds itself in trouble when they are given a mission to take out a new Jovian weapon called a "Walking Stick." After the weapon's initial offensive critically damages the Nadesico's systems, it's up to the Aestivalis pilots to reach the deadly weapon and destroy it before it can recharge for a second barrage. But if the pilots can't figure out the true meaning of teamwork soon, it might spell the end for the Nadesico.

episodes.title: Ano 'Wasureenu hibi'
episodes.plot: When the Nadesico's defense system malfunctions, Admiral Munetake decides that the ship's memory banks should be completely wiped.

episodes.title: 'Shinjitsu' wa hitotsu ja nai
episodes.plot: Christmas may be near at hand, but it's not going to be a happy holiday for the crew of the Nadesico. The UEAF doesn't want such a powerful warship under the command of civilians and is giving the crew a choice: Join the military or get off the ship. Taking advantage of the opportunity, Erina offers Akito a job assisting in her organic boson-jumping research. But is being her pawn worth the risk, or should he forget about the offer and spend a quiet holiday with Megumi?

episodes.title: 'Nekketsu anime' de ikô
episodes.plot: In a reversal of perspective, the Gekigangar crew settle down to watch the latest adventures of their favorite show: Martian Successor Nadesico!

episodes.title: Tôi hoshi kara kita 'kareshi'
episodes.plot: While Akito is trapped on the moon, Admiral Munetake suspects that the pilot of the Jovian robot they recovered may be hiding somewhere on the ship.

episodes.title: 'Bokutachi no sensô' ga hajimaru
episodes.plot: The revelation of the true nature of the Jovians has shaken some of the Nergal employees. Could spies in their midst already know about their secret plans? Meanwhile, Tsukumo takes Megumi and Minato to a Jovian starship. Surprises abound for the entire Nadesico crew as they learn the truth about their enemy.

episodes.title: Sore wa 'ososugita saikai'
episodes.plot: Nergal discovers that Uribatake has been embezzling funds and spending a lot of time with Hikaru.

episodes.title: Mizu no oto wa 'watashi' no oto
episodes.plot: Ruri discovers that she's the biological daughter of the king and queen of a kingdom called Peaceland. With Akito acting as her "knight", Ruri sets off to Peaceland in the hope of filling in the gaps in her memory.

episodes.title: Asu no 'kanchô' wa kimi da!
episodes.plot: Nergal decides that to keep the Nadesico crew happy, they'll give them a new captain! What better way to pick one than to hold a talent contest?

episodes.title: Itsuka hashitta 'sôgen'
episodes.plot: The Nadesico's new mission is to defend the moon using its new phase-transition cannon, but when something goes wrong with the Y Unit, the weapon becomes inoperable.

episodes.title: Doko ni demo aru 'seigi'
episodes.plot: When Tsukumo arrives on board to act as an ambassador, Yurika organizes a ship-wide "Geki-Fest."

episodes.title: 'Watashi rashiku' jibun rashiku
episodes.plot: As the Jovians gear up for a final offensive, the Nadesico crew finds themself working alongside their sister ship, the Kakitsubata, to maintain control over Mars.

episodes.title: Itsuka au anata no tame ni
episodes.plot: With the Jovian fleet closing in, it's up to the Nadesico to keep the ancient Martian ruins out of enemy hands. Unfortunately, it's beginning to look like the only way they're going to be able to do that is to destroy them!
